features: Premium Quality: The flexible tripod legs are made of thick premium metal and full metal connector, reinforced with a rubber coating and sturdy foam. The non-skid rubber feet design keeps the adjustable tripod very stable whether on a desk or floor.

Lightweight and Compact Tripod: The UBeesize’s extra-flexible legs allow you to instantly bend them to any angle for effortless set-up, and you can even wrap the legs around objects like railings for extra variety in shot compositions and framing. Besides, this flexible tripod can be straightened with ease for storage or putting into backpack for traveling, hiking or camping, or even working as a selfie stick.

Multi-Angle Shots:The updated clip can be rotated 360 degrees, hold your cellphone in both portrait, vertical, and high angle mode without having to take the phone down. Besides, the 360°rotatable ball joint enables you to control the angle of phone/camera with smooth movement.

Functional Accessories: Comes with an upgraded universal phone holder (works for cellphones up to 5.23 inches wide, a wireless Bluetooth remote (compatible with most cell phones and controls up to 30 feet away). By a standard adapter screw thread, it is compatible with digital cameras and GoPro.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Easy to carry Just put it in your bag and take it with you to explore every corner of the world. Ultra stable Non-slip pad design makes the tripod very stable, allowing you to video with your family anytime. High flexibility Flexible tripod can be wrapped around various objects to add versatility in composition and framing. Next page 1 Grip 2 Stand 3 Wrap

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Content Creators!
reviews.reviewText: I'm a henna artist and needed a mini tripod to record myself doing henna so that I could make tiktoks, reels, etc. This tripod is PERFECT, as I'm doing my client's henna, the tripod is propped up on the table. The bendy legs are so versatile, the phone can move 360 degrees, it fits in my purse, and it balances really well.If you're an artist/content creator (especially for art pages) this tripod is a need!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and compact
reviews.reviewText: This little affordable tripod surpassed my expectations. I took it on vacation recently, and it was so convenient! It was flexible and strong enough to hold my iPhone 13 (with case) and my Canon G7 X on its own without tipping over. The grip is also really firm, providing me with a sense of security when holding it. It also feels really nice and fits in my purse easily. No issues so far; 10/10, recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful bendy legs
reviews.reviewText: I use a small tripod on my phone daily. The ball joint is fantastic, the legs seem like they'll hold up nicely, thumb screw is well made. It's great in nearly every aspect.Unfortunately, for my use of holding my phone... It's not perfect. To have your phone in portrait for scrolling and what not you have to use the notch in the part holding the ball. No problem really, but in that orientation the tripod is unstable, because the phone part flipps outward. You can bend the legs to counteract this. My next issue is that the part that flipps out, to hold the cell phone isn't very secure. My phone has come out multiple times while taking photos on hikes. I absolutely do not trust it to hold my phone if were moving around a lot. Like on a bike or out a moving car window. You also can't change out the part that holds your phone for something more secure.I do not have a proper camera so I can't say how secure that aspect is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product was received as expected, on time. quality product. Good seller, I recommend it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This short adjustable tripod is a game-changer for capturing shots on tables, counters, and various flat surfaces. It's incredibly easy to manage, providing a hassle-free experience. The compact design makes it a breeze to store, and considering its very affordable price, the value is exceptional. If you're seeking a versatile and budget-friendly tripod for your photography needs, this one is a solid choice. Highly recommended for its convenience and great value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars That it works and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: No directions came with it. Don’t know how to use the fab that I goes turns it on??

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly What I Wanted
reviews.reviewText: With a desktop Mac, such as the Mac Mini, or Mac Studio, it is great to be able to use your iPhone as a camera for web meetings. Apple calls this "Continuity Camera", and there are various holders made for using your iPhone in the manner. The problem is that they clip on top of your monitor.I was looking for a holder, or stand, that allows my iPhone to sit on my desk, at a height equal to my face, rather than perched on top of a large monitor and looking down from above. The UBeesize flexible tripod fit the bill, and works perfectly for that purpose. The flexible legs, and adjustable ball-joint, allow for positioning the phone in any manner desired. Fits my need perfectly, and I can easily recommend it.
Easy to setup and works great with a light box. Easy mounting for my cell phone and the adjustable legs are super electable.

reviews.reviewTitle: ALMOST perfect - - STILL giving it 5 Stars!
reviews.reviewText: What a pleasant surprise to receive this Ubeesize tripod. I do not know where to begin - so many features that are CLEARLY superior to the better-known “Jxxx” brand!!I ordered a Joby - direct from them - and it was junk compared to this item.When dealing with that other outfit - I ended up dealing with FIVE different companies - to return it - marketing, product support, fulfilment, warranty, return - ALL different companies!! (Still waiting for my credit for the one I tried - and returned.)I should have known - when I saw the weight - of the competitive model... I find this Ubeesize to be the right weight - for ME. It is almost double what a similar sized name-brand model weighs - but THIS ONE IS ROBUST!! If featherweight is your main goal - this may not be for you. But if you want something that looks like it will last years in everyday abuse - - this might be for you.I ordered this quickly - did not read the features properly - thought it might be foolish - since I was so unhappy with a known-competitors similar costing MUCH MORE! I was pleasantly surprised to see that this, is the way I want to go! - The legs are firmly attached to the mounting point - not feeling like they are about to fall off! (COMMON on most competitors) - The mounting assembly - which holds my phone - while in it’s case - AND is also suitable for 1/4” mount cameras - is simply ingenious - VERY clever. (I initially thought I had ordered the wrong SKU - - seeing the 1/4” mount only. Men don’t read instructions so I fiddled with it and it flipped open to reveal a robust and SMART design that allows it to be used for all sorts of devices.) - the optional mounting accessories are handy - for use with GoPro and such. Neat! - 3 year warranty?? - - BONUS!My ONLY gripe - is the Bluetooth remote... I love it but it won’t work.That too - is vastly superior to the one that came with the Joby model. Again - this one is robust and I would put it on my keychain, (competitors has a piece of thread to attach to your key ring...)It does indicate that the remote may NOT work with some models of phones... I have a Pixel P3 and the remote will connect to the camera - but activates the ZOOM feature instead of activating the shutter. Close - but no cigar. (And I did also try the recommended app - with the same result).Does anyone have a fix for that? I would really like to be able to control my P3 when mounted on this fine tripod remotely.But I am STILL giving this device a 5 star rating.SO VASTLY SUPERIOR TO THE NAME-BRAND, in every way - in My Opinion.Oh yeah - - and at just more than HALF THE PRICE OF THE NAME-BRAND... Sort of a no-brainer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 25, 2021

reviews.reviewText: I use it when I need to do some recording of things on my laptop. Also came in useful to hold my mobile when my grandchildren call on FaceTime as it’s the perfect height for conversation without straining my neck and eyes.
